# ===================================================
# Standard .gitignore file for MATLAB Projects
# ===================================================

# MATLAB auto-generated files
*.asv
*.m~
*.log
*.tmp
*.bak
*~
.#*

# MATLAB temporary files
*.mdl.tmp
*.slx.tmp

# MATLAB crash dump files
*.dmp

# MATLAB Coder files
codegen/
slprj/

# MATLAB package files
*.mlappinstall
*.mlpkginstall

# MATLAB Profiler files
*.prof

# --- Project-Specific ---

# Ignore generated MAT-files (simulation results)
# We want to keep our INPUT .mat file, but ignore results
*.mat
!wltp_time_n_q.mat

# Ignore generated plots
*.fig
*.png
*.jpg
*.pdf
